title: John Wick 4
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.
cast: Keanu Reeves | Laurence Fishburne | George Georgiou

title: Hidden Strike
description: Two ex-special forces soldiers must escort a group of civilians along Baghdad's Highway of Death to the safety of the Green Zone.
cast: Jackie Chan | John Cena | Chunrui Ma

title: Extraction 2
description: After barely surviving his grievous wounds from his mission in Dhaka, Bangladesh, Tyler Rake is back, and his team is ready to take on their next mission.
cast: Chris Hemsworth | Golshifteh Farahani | Adam Bessa

title: Ghosted
cast: Chris Evans | Ana de Armas | Adrien Brody
description: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

title: Beautiful Disaster
description: College freshman, Abby, tries to distance herself from her dark past while resisting her attraction to bad boy, Travis.
cast: Micky Dartford | Libe Barer | Neil Bishop

title: Red, White & Royal Blue
description: When the feud between the son of the American President and Britain's prince threatens to drive a wedge in U.S./British relations, the two are forced into a staged truce that sparks something deeper.
cast: Jemma Redgrave | Thomas Flynn | Bridget Benstead

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
description: The film follows the Turtle brothers as they work to earn the love of New York City while facing down an army of mutants.
cast: Micah Abbey | Shamon Brown Jr. | Nicolas Cantu

title: Peter Pan & Wendy
description: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.
cast: Alexander Molony | Ever Anderson | Jude Law

title: Stan Lee
description: 100 years of dreaming. 100 years of creating. 100 years of Stan Lee.
cast: Kevin Feige | Jack Kirby | J.C. Lee

title: The Deepest Breath
description: A champion and expert safety diver seemed destined for one another. Despite different paths taken, they meet at the pinnacle of the free-diving world, experiencing the thrilling rewards and inescapable risks of chasing dreams through the depths of the ocean.
cast: David Attenborough | Leigh Baker | Mahmoud Barracuda

title: Battle on Buka Street
description: After a lifetime of rivalry, two half-sisters find themselves at loggerheads once again when they set up food businesses on the same street.
cast: Funke Akindele | Bimbo Ademoye | Victor Adesokan

title: The Man From Toronto
description: The world's deadliest assassin and New York's biggest screw-up are mistaken for each other at an Airbnb rental.
cast: Kevin Hart | Woody Harrelson | Jasmine Mathews

title: The Adam Project
description: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future.
cast: Ryan Reynolds | Walker Scobell | Mark Ruffalo

title: Uncharted
description: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago by the House of Moncada.

title: Gray Man
description: When the CIA's most skilled operative, whose true identity is known to none, accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assassins.
cast: Ryan Gosling | Chris Evans | Ana de Armas

title: All The Old Knives
description: Veteran CIA agent Henry is reunited in Vienna with his former colleague and lover Celia.
cast: Goksin Erdemli | Kasia Madera | Chris Pine

title: After Ever Happy
description: As a shocking truth about a couple's families emerges, the two lovers discover they are not so different from each other. Tessa is no longer the sweet, simple, good girl she was when she met Hardin â€” any more than he is the cruel, moody boy she fell so hard for.
cast: Josephine Langford | Hero Fiennes Tiffin | Louise Lombard

title: Enter Galactic
description: Jabari, a charming, streetwear-clad artist on the cusp of real success. After a chance run-in with his cool new photographer neighbor, Meadow, Jabari has to figure out whether he can make space for love in his life.
cast: Kid Cudi | Jessica Williams | Laura Harrier

title: The Woman King
description: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.
cast: Viola Davis | Thuso Mbedu | Lashana Lynch

title: Me Time
description: Follows a dad who finds time for himself for the first time in years while his wife and kids are away. He reconnects with a friend for a wild weekend.
cast: Kevin Hart | Mark Wahlberg | Regina Hall

title: Them
description: Humans live in a comfortable dream that repeats itself. They control the dream. They were humans once too. Some humans wake up, most don't. Daniel wakes to be told that things could be different. Daniel believes it. For a while at least.
cast: Sain Altman, Kate Dalton

title: Rising Wolf
description: A young environmentalist wakes, trapped, kidnapped in the elevator of a super high-rise building at the mercy of her tormentors.
cast: Charlotte Best, Alex Mengiest

title: It Came from Below
description: A group of friends find themselves hunted down in the caves by a creature... from another world.
cast: Megan Purvis, Becca Hirani

title: Snake Eyes
description: A G.I. Joe spin-off centered around the character of Snake Eyes.
cast: Henry Golding | Andrew Koji | Haruka Abe

title: Blippi Wonders
description: Ever curious Blippi sets off on comedic and fun adventures in his BlippiMobile along with his faithful sidekicks TABBS & FETCH, who help him find the answers to a burning question of the day.
cast: Stevin John

title: New Materials
description: New Material is the much anticipated return of Cassim trying to figure out family, love, kids and comedy.
cast: Riaad Moosa

title: Dwellers: The Curse of Pastor Stokes
description: A puzzle of dark secrets surfaces when a pastor inherits a church from his mentor.
cast: Stan J. Adams, Brittany Beckett

title: Nothing But Thirty
description: Gu Jia is strong willed, and is both a housewife and a businesswoman. She helped her husband become the CEO of a fireworks company, and fought rich housewives who bullied her son. Wang Manni is rebellious, and is confident at both her workplace and at home. Zhong Xiaoqin is content with her average life, with a normal job and a husband who likes fish
cast: Jiang Shuying,  Tong Yao

title: So late So Soon
description: A half-century into their marriage, two Chicago artists look back at their life together as they contend with the deterioration of their bodies and beloved home.
cast: James Clancy, Sarah Hymanson

title: Jack & Yaya
description: Jack and Yaya met at ages three and two through their shared backyard fence. They spent their childhood together, building forts and burning trash cans in their small hometown in South Jersey. From a young age, Yaya and Jack saw each other as they truly were, a girl and a boy, even though the rest of the world didn't see them that way. As they grew older, they supported each other as they both came out as transgender
cast: Yaya & Jack

title: Half Empty/Half Full
description: Four friends reunite for a dinner to catch up on each other's lives. As the night progresses, it devolves into a whirlwind of jealousy, lies and big revelations. This dramatic story unfolds in real time.
cast: Mia Barron, Stark Sands

title: By Light of Desert Night
description: Three best friends head on a road trip into the desert for one final camping adventure, but dark secrets are revealed that will change their lives forever.
cast: Meghan Carrasquillo, Alexandra Bokova

title: They're Outside
description: They're Outside is a 2020 horror movie that follows a married couple, Alex and Gemma who are hosting a reality TV show that focuses on debunking supernatural activities. Set in a remote location, the two presenters have only one night to solve the mystery of a haunted cottage, where a family was brutally murdered years ago
cast: Emily Booth,   Emma Bourdon

title: Hell House LLC III: Lake of Fire
description: The Abaddon Hotel will once again be open to the public. Russell Wynn has taken his audience-interactive show, Insomnia, into the abandoned hotel that is rumored to be haunted.
cast: Gabriel Chytry,  Elizabeth Vermilyea

title: Tom Clancy's Jack Ryan
description: Jack Ryan is a movie about a young covert C.I.A. analyst who uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack1. The film is a contemporary prequel, set during 2002, and portrays a younger Jack Ryan2. After the terrorist attacks on 9/11, Jack Ryan becomes a U.S. Marine fighting in Afghanistan, where his spine is critically injured when his helicopter is shot down13
cast: Jack Rayn , James Greer
